problem.markdown: Under what conditions does a gas follow Boyle’s law to a good approximation? ( ) high temperature and high pressure (x) high temperature and low pressure ( ) low temperature and high pressure ( ) low temperature and low pressure [explanation] Low density of the system is required, this is achieved at high temperature and low pressure. problem.p: Under what conditions does a gas follow Boyle’s law to a good approximation?

div.p: Low density of the system is required, this is achieved at high temperature and low pressure.
